Name: How much is the presentation time for each presenter?
Description:
The presentation time for each speaker is 15 minutes, with 10 minutes Q&A with the audience.

There will be a time-keeper and moderator that will guide the presenters and participants during the presentation session.

Name: Is there a registration fee for KIPI 2022?
Description: KIPI is free! There is no registration fee for both presenters and participants.

Name: What happens if my abstract is selected for KIPI?
Description: If your abstract is selected for KIPI, we will ask you to prepare an academic poster to be put on PPIA's website or a PPT document to be presented at the conference on 14-15 May 2022, where you will present in front of some of the leading scholars of your field. We will compile your abstract and poster with other conference presenters' abstracts and posters into one KIPI 2022 program book.

Name: Where is KIPI 2022 going to be held?
Description: KIPI would be hybrid either so you can either come online via Zoom or attend offline at Colombo Theater A, the University of New South Wales Sydney Australia, on the 14 and 15 May 2022.
